text: Siratal-lazeena an'amta alayhim ghayril-maghdoobi alayhim wa lad-dalleen
Zalikal-kitabu la rayba feeh, hudan lil-muttaqeen
Allazeena yu'minoona bil-ghaybi wa yuqeemoonas-salata wa mimma razaqnahum yunfiqoon
Wallazeena yu'minoona bima unzila ilayka wa ma unzila min qablik, wa bil-akhirati hum yooqinoon
Ulaika ala hudan min rabbihim wa ulaika humul-muflihoon
